channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-15569] failures in RetryingHMSHandler.<init> do not get retried
item.description: RetryingHMSHandler.<init> is called during Hive metastore startup, and any transient db failures during that call are not retried. This can result in failure for HiveMetastore startup.
item.summary: failures in RetryingHMSHandler.<init> do not get retried

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
A transient issue can result in a stack trace like the following and prevent hive metastore from starting up -

javax.jdo.JDOUserException: Could not create "increment"/"table" value-generation container v32d62a291db22b404b89ebdc6daa601a6ahivemetastore.dbo.SEQUENCE_TABLE since autoCreate flags do not allow it. 
at org.datanucleus.api.jdo.NucleusJDOHelper.getJDOExceptionForNucleusException(NucleusJDOHelper.java:549)
at org.datanucleus.api.jdo.JDOPersistenceManager.jdoMakePersistent(JDOPersistenceManager.java:732)
at org.datanucleus.api.jdo.JDOPersistenceManager.makePersistent(JDOPersistenceManager.java:752)
at org.apache.hadoop.hive.metastore.ObjectStore.addRole(ObjectStore.java:3201)
at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:57)
at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:43)
at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:606)
at org.apache.hadoop.hive.metastore.RawStoreProxy.invoke(RawStoreProxy.java:98)
at com.sun.proxy.$Proxy0.addRole(Unknown Source)
at org.apache.hadoop.hive.metastore.HiveMetaStore$HMSHandler.createDefaultRoles_core(HiveMetaStore.java:630)
at org.apache.hadoop.hive.metastore.HiveMetaStore$HMSHandler.createDefaultRoles(HiveMetaStore.java:619)
at org.apache.hadoop.hive.metastore.HiveMetaStore$HMSHandler.init(HiveMetaStore.java:437)
at org.apache.hadoop.hive.metastore.RetryingHMSHandler.<init>(RetryingHMSHandler.java:66)
at org.apache.hadoop.hive.metastore.RetryingHMSHandler.getProxy(RetryingHMSHandler.java:72)
at org.apache.hadoop.hive.metastore.HiveMetaStore.newRetryingHMSHandler(HiveMetaStore.java:5503)
at org.apache.hadoop.hive.metastore.HiveMetaStore.newRetryingHMSHandler(HiveMetaStore.java:5498)
at org.apache.hadoop.hive.metastore.HiveMetaStore.startMetaStore(HiveMetaStore.java:5721)
at org.apache.hadoop.hive.metastore.HiveMetaStore.main(HiveMetaStore.java:5656)
thejas I can take a look at this ..

Hi spena and thejas Can you please review the patch? The test failures are unrelated and have been failing recently for other patches too.
Thanks vihangk1 for the patch. I committed to master.

vihangk1
